channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped mattress, 22nd October
item.description:
It's been there for a few days. No note to suggest any plans for it. It's quite prominent on London road. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11-21, London Road, Forest Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip of garden waste and fence panels, 22nd October
item.description:
Alleyway at one of craydene road side roads has been used as a dumping alley for garden waste and fence panels from someone who recently had work done it is a safety hazard and an eyesore
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Craydene Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recycling bins overflowing, 22nd October
item.description:
The three recycling bins on Charles Grinling Walk are full to overflowing having not been collected for about two weeks. Please empty these bins as soon as possible. Residents currently have nowhere convenient to dispose of recycling without littering the street, causing unnecessary work for RBG street cleaners.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charles Grinling Walk, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded road markings, 22nd October
item.description:
The junction markings have faded to a degree that they are not visible. Due to a new housing development impefindd visibility, this create a dangerous junction, with vehicles not stopping to check for other vehicles

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prospect Vale, Charlton Riverside, London

item.title: An important follow up., 22nd October
item.description:
Dear Staff Member, I hope you are well. I am writing to check if all is good and the problems that I sent via email, are being checked. I sent the emergency email to my MP, MP Diane Abbott, on 21/04/2025. Looking forward to hearing from you.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fountayne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Filthy contaminated waste behind the green fuse box, 22nd October
item.description:
The street cleaners never clean behind the green cable box on the corner of Heath Road and Crayford rd. people go to the shop over the road and buy alcohol and throw the bottles behind the green cable box as there are no bins available - we have to live with this rubbish - itâ€™s sickening and disgusting and Iâ€™m tired of having to report it!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 63, Crayford Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet
